text: @narendramodi Stay at home and stay safe everyone...this is for your good.. don't go out unless required..!! Please take care everyone and co-operate with the government orders..!! Thank you..#GoCoronaCoronaGo #CoronavirusPandemic #stayhealthystayhappy
